thread.title: EzPaycheck Payroll Software Now Accommodates Accountants In Editing Reports
thread.title_full: EzPaycheck Payroll Software Now Accommodates Accountants In Editing Reports

author: PRWEB
title: EzPaycheck Payroll Software Now Accommodates Accountants In Editing Reports
text:
ezPaycheck payroll software can now export payroll data to generate customized reports. We added this new feature to meet the special needs of accountants and tax professionals. Atlanta, GA (PRWEB) July 24, 2015
Business owners have requested an edit report feature for ezPaycheck payroll software. Halfpricesoft.com has just released a new version that makes it simple for customers to export and then edit reports in an Excel file and generate customized reports to meet special needs of companies.
“ezPaycheck payroll software can now export payroll data to generate customized reports. We added this new feature to meet the special needs of accountants and tax professionals.” said Dr. Ge, the founder of halfpricesoft.com.
EzPaycheck payroll software also includes the latest tax tables and tax forms. This paycheck software supports flexible tax options to accommodate small businesses, nonprofits and churches.
EzPaycheck software was created to less expensively automate paycheck processes in-in house. The user guide allows for step-by-step setup of employee information, importing data, calculating payroll - including calculation of federal, state and local taxes; deductions for Medicare, insurance and 401(k) plans; and printing paychecks. Download and test drive this innovative software for 30-days at no obligation and no cost at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/payroll_software_download.asp
Small businesses and nonprofits will appreciate the unique features in the latest release of ezPaycheck payroll software:
Supports daily, weekly, biweekly, semimonthly and monthly payroll periods. Features report functions, print functions, and pay stub functions. Creates and maintains payrolls for multiple companies, and does it simultaneously.
Prints Tax Forms 940, 941, W-2 and W-3.
Supports multiple accounts at no additional charge.
Supports network access.
Easily calculates differential pay
Prints miscellaneous checks as well as payroll calculation checks.
Prints payroll checks on blank computer checks or preprinted checks.
Automatically calculates Federal Withholding Tax, Social Security, Medicare Tax and Employer Unemployment Taxes.
Includes built-in tax tables for all 50 states and the District of Columbia.
Priced at $89 per calendar year, ezPaycheck payroll software is affordable for any size business owner.
Customers seeking a way to simplify payroll processing with more accuracy to start the no obligation 30-day test drive today at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Founded in 2003, Halfpricesoft.com has established itself as a leader in meeting and exceeding the software requirements of small businesses around the world. Offering payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, check writing/printing software, W2 software, 1099 software and ezACH deposit software. It continues to grow in the philosophy that small business owners deserve affordable, user friendly, and totally risk-free software.
